CommandDefinition.Name: printdependencies
CommandDefinition.Description: Prints the dependencies of the specified object

Argument.Name: object
Argument.Description: The object whose dependencies are requested

Argument.Name: objectType
Argument.Description: Valid values are: Datatype, Workflow, Trigger, Filter, XynaProperty, XynaFactory, SharedLib, XynaException

BoolOption.Name: r
BoolOption.Description: Search for dependencies recursively and print the whole tree

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: A version name of the application.
